meals	CREATE TABLE `meals` (

  `carbs` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `fibre` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `aiDescription` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `aiConfidence` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `nutritionScore` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `notes` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `beverageType` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `beverageVolumeMl` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `beverageCalories` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `beverageProtein` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `beverageFat` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `beverageCarbs` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `beverageFibre` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `loggedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `components` json DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */,
